Uses of Class
com.hazelcast.jet.core.Vertex

Packages that use Vertex
Package Description
com.hazelcast.jet.core
Jet's Core API.

  • Uses of Vertex in com.hazelcast.jet.core

    Methods in com.hazelcast.jet.core that return Vertex
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vertex Edge.getDestination()
    Returns this edge's destination vertex.
    Vertex Edge.getSource()
    Returns this edge's source vertex.
    Vertex DAG.getVertex​(String vertexName)
    Returns the vertex with the given name, or null if there is no vertex with that name.
    Vertex Vertex.localParallelism​(int localParallelism)
    Sets the number of processors corresponding to this vertex that will be created on each member.
    Vertex DAG.newVertex​(String name, SupplierEx<? extends Processor> simpleSupplier)
    Creates a vertex from a Supplier<Processor> and adds it to this DAG.
    Vertex DAG.newVertex​(String name, ProcessorMetaSupplier metaSupplier)
    Creates a vertex from a ProcessorMetaSupplier and adds it to this DAG.
    Vertex DAG.newVertex​(String name, ProcessorSupplier processorSupplier)
    Creates a vertex from a ProcessorSupplier and adds it to this DAG.
    Methods in com.hazelcast.jet.core that return types with arguments of type Vertex
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Iterator<Vertex> DAG.iterator()
    Returns an iterator over the DAG's vertices in topological order.
    Methods in com.hazelcast.jet.core with parameters of type Vertex
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Edge Edge.between​(Vertex source, Vertex destination)
    Returns an edge between two vertices.
    static Edge Edge.from​(Vertex source)
    Returns an edge with the given source vertex and no destination vertex.
    static Edge Edge.from​(Vertex source, int ordinal)
    Returns an edge with the given source vertex at the given ordinal and no destination vertex.
    Edge Edge.to​(Vertex destination)
    Sets the destination vertex of this edge, with ordinal 0.
    Edge Edge.to​(Vertex destination, int ordinal)
    Sets the destination vertex and ordinal of this edge.
    DAG DAG.vertex​(Vertex vertex)
    Adds a vertex to this DAG.

    Constructor Description
    Edge​(Vertex source, int sourceOrdinal, Vertex destination, int destOrdinal)
